name: NoBot
0:
”Alexa, open No Bot”
”Alexa, ask No Bot if my kids can go out tonight”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: no bot
des: Tired of telling your children no? Feel bad rejecting a date? Let No Bot handle the hard part for you! With No Bot, there's plenty of ways to say no! Ask it any question and it will respond "No" in one of many ways!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
